name: include
description: Include certain buttons. Buttons order will be as you type it, default: [ALL_BUTTONS]

name: theme
description: Set buttons theme name, default: null

name: xAccount
description: Add via @accountName at the end of the posts on X (Twitter), default: null

name: windowWidth
description: Share popup window width when "SharerMethod" is Window, default: 800

name: windowHeight
description: Share popup window height when "SharerMethod" is Window, default: 500

name: moreButtonIcon
description: More button icon in "<share-buttons>" component, default: 'ellipsis-h'

name: lessButtonIcon
description: Less button icon in "<share-buttons>" component, default: 'minus'

name: moreButtonAriaLabel
description: More button aria label in "<share-buttons>" component, default: 'Show more share buttons'

name: lessButtonAriaLabel
description: Less button aria label in "<share-buttons>" component, default: 'Show less share buttons'

name: sharerMethod
description: Set the method used to open the share window, either 'anchor' or 'window', default: 'anchor'

name: sharerTarget
description: Set the open share target, default: '_blank'

name: windowObj
description: Set the window object, used for Ionic to replace 'Window' with Cordova's 'InAppBrowser', works only when sharerMethod is 'window', default: Window

name: windowFuncName
description: Set the function name used to open the share window, default: 'open'

name: messengerAppId
description: Set the appId for Messenger which is required on desktop, default: null

name: debug
description: A boolean flag that enables debugging mode, default: false
